Hero.title: Reliable Accounting
Hero.bodyText: Our team helps you not only with financial reporting and tax obligation management, but also with shaping future plans and attracting investments in a targeted manner — in full compliance with international standards.

AboutUs.title: AboutUs
AboutUs.overview: LTD provides accounting services in Georgia, both for Georgians and non-residents. Accounting is one of the main foundations of the financial success of any organization.
AboutUs.importance: It records, summarizes and systematically analyzes the financial operations of the company. Pilz LTD's accounting standards are in line with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
AboutUs.businessSupport: Through our services, we help businesses predict possible future activities. This significantly helps them in planning, attracting new investments.
AboutUs.structure: Accounting services follow a certain logical sequence. Assets, liabilities, expenses, income, and equity components are classified and presented in financial reports in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
AboutUs.professionalSupport: Our highly qualified team of professional accountants will assist you with financial accounting, reporting, and timely fulfillment of tax obligations, allowing you to focus entirely on managing your business.
AboutUs.insurance: Our services are insured. We are responsible for tax or other financial losses caused by us, up to 100,000 GEL.

1.title: Accounting Services
text: Our team of professionals with many years of experience provides accounting services in full compliance with international standards. We continuously train and certify our accountants and financial specialists in both tax legislation and accounting standards.
list: Consulting in accounting and tax activities;
Creating an electronic database of documents;
Monthly financial reports for company management;

Annual financial statements, which include several stages: A statement of financial position or balance sheet, including assets and liabilities; Profit and loss or income statement, including revenues and expenses; Cash flow statement, including cash flows.

2.title: Tax Matters
text: Our professional and experienced team, which undergoes regular training and certification, will check your company`s tax position and protect your interests with tax authorities. We provide representation and defend our clients’ interests in tax disputes (including legal analysis of assessments, complaint preparation, and representation at all stages of dispute resolution). (Support in the preliminary ruling process includes identifying the client's tax risks, preparing a letter requesting a preliminary ruling and protecting the client's interests during discussions with the Revenue Service).
We also help select the optimal tax regime based on the company`s goals.
You can choose a service package tailored to your needs
list: Control of the correctness of monthly tax declarations;
Assistance in communication with tax authorities

3.title: Bookkeeping
text: Our bookkeeping service allows companies to simplify the accounting process. We handle all accounting entries, while the chief accountant is only responsible for analyzing information and submitting tax declarations. As a result, we reduce the daily administrative workload of the chief accountant, relieving them from the “heavy lifting.”
list: Recording bank statements in accounting software;
Full processing of all other transactions;
Setup of internal control systems to ensure high-quality transactions;

4.title: Financial Management
text: The main goal of financial management is the detailed evaluation of financial data to study your business and gain a strategic overview, which enables us to reduce costs and increase the company's profitability under existing resources. Through effective financial management, we perform a detailed cost analysis, control cash flow, analyze profitability, and structure and analyze the financial data of the business. This helps us make accurate and forward-looking revenue forecasts. Based on the analysis of this data, we prepare specific actionable recommendations aimed at increasing the financial profitability of the business.

5.title: AML-CFT
text: Assessment of risk level related to anti-money laundering and counter-financing of terrorism. The compliance officer will thoroughly verify the company, clients, beneficiaries, and the validity of fund flows, and issue appropriate recommendations.

6.title: Consulting
text: Our qualified and professional consulting team will explain accounting and tax issues in a clear and understandable way. At the early stage of business development, receiving accurate and relevant information is crucial for proper planning of business and operational processes.
